meta.name: Arc'teryx
meta.description: Canadian technical outerwear brand known for precision alpine design and durable materials.

overview.history: Arc'teryx was founded in North Vancouver in 1989 and quickly became synonymous with progressive alpine gear. The brand is known for innovating harness construction and pushing forward GORE-TEX applications in outerwear.
overview.designPhilosophy: Relentless pursuit of performance, clean lines, and purpose-driven silhouettes designed from the alpine outward.

insights.title: Why the Beta Series Matters
insights.body: The Beta line strikes a balance between serious alpine features and everyday wear. Lightweight shells, articulated patterns, and durable face fabrics make the Beta series a go-to for four-season versatility.

insights.title: Sizing Notes for Japanese Buyers
insights.body: Arc'teryx uses US/International sizing. For buyers familiar with Japanese brands, consider sizing down one step for a similar fit, or consult the Beta specific size chart when available.

items.name: Beta Jacket
items.summary: Lightweight GORE-TEX All-Round shell. Ideal for shoulder seasons and fast alpine missions.
focusKeywords: アークテリクス ベータジャケット

items.name: Beta AR Jacket
items.summary: The iconic do-everything alpine shell with reinforced high-wear zones.
focusKeywords: ベータ AR ジャケット
